header.title: The Police Are Involved In Every Aspect Of American Life

title: The Police Are Involved In Every Aspect Of American Life
content:
The police seem to be an integral part of everyone’s life in the U.S. today. Even involving social problems. <!--more--> Errant school behavior has become a police issue.
Driving without a seat belt can easily escalate into an arrest.
Air travel pat downs.
Suspicion (justified or not) of drug use.
Even staying at home can be hazardous.
Anyone who “looks Latino” is at high risk of being stopped as being potentially ‘undocumented’.
The outrage of incarceration in the US It is said the average American commits three felonies a day without being aware of it.
Poverty and deprivation in the UK How future generations unborn are being robbed today.
US households’ net worth at a record high.
Yes but… GDP grow misrepresented as usual.
